mapper.select: select lessondetail_no, lessondetail_title, lessondetail_content, lessondetail_chapter, lessondetail_running_time, ifnull((select lessondetail_comp from lessondetail d join lessoncomp c on d.lessondetail_no = c.lessondetail_no where c.lessondetail_no = k.lessondetail_no and c.member_id = #{member_id}),0) lessondetail_comp from lessondetail k where lesson_no = #{lesson_no}
select lesson_title from lesson where lesson_no = #{lesson_no}
mapper.insert: insert into lessoncomp(lessondetail_no, member_id, lessondetail_comp, lesson_no, lessoncomp_date) value(#{lessondetail_no},#{member_id},0, #{lesson_no},now())
mapper.select: select round( count( if( ifnull((select lessondetail_comp from lessondetail d join lessoncomp c on d.lessondetail_no = c.lessondetail_no where c.lessondetail_no = k.lessondetail_no and c.member_id = #{member_id}),0), 1, null) ) / (select lesson_number from lesson where lesson_no = #{lesson_no}) * 100, 1) as procent from lessondetail k
